name: Injection: Pain
content: This injection does not inflict pain, but rather hypersensitizes the dermal nerve network, making a creature feel all sensations with uncomfortable intensity. Each time a hit target takes damage, it suffers an additional 1d4 damage. This is not affected by a critical hit. At the beginning of its turn, the target can make a DC13 Constitution saving throw. It must pass two consecutive saving throws to recover from this effect.
